content: Hi. I was wondering if there is any active work on the async book (https://rust-lang.github.io/async-book/)? I'm trying to get a bearing if there is any interest in accepting contributions to it.
@Carl Fredrik Samson there isn't a lot of active work that I know of, but I think we are interested in contributions
but you can see that there hasn't been a lot of bandwidth and activity
@tmandry we should probably be monitoring PRs on the book though...
maybe that just wants a distinct person to manage

Yeah, I noticed there has been little activity. I made a PR to the chapter about Pin that I perceived as a bit of a confusing concept for many (including myself 6 moths ago) but it's been 4 weeks and very little interest so I thought I'd check before investing more into it.
I'm happy to help monitor that repo
